<h3 id="X13891">X(13891)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL AND 2nd AURIGA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (-(2*a+b+c)*K-a^2*(a+b+c)*(-a+b+c))*S-K*(a+b+c)*a^2  :  :  , where K=4*S*sqrt(R*(4*R+r))<p>X(13891) lies on these lines: {6,13945}, {55,8983}, {371,8203}, {485,9835}, {590,5600}, {1125,13944}, {3068,5598}, {3361,13902}, {5599,7969}, {5602,8972}, {8187,13888}, {8191,13889}, {8204,13893}, {8205,8974}, {8206,8975}, {8207,8976}, {8981,11253}, {8987,12457}, {8988,12461}, {8992,12475}, {8993,12477}, {8997,13177}, {8998,13209}, {9540,11823}, {11208,13846}, {11385,13884}, {11493,13887}, {11838,13885}, {11844,13886}, {11862,13892}, {11866,13895}, {11868,13896}, {11870,13897}, {11872,13898}, {11876,13903}, {11878,13904}, {11882,13906}, {12346,13908}, {12455,13911}, {12459,13912}, {12463,13913}, {13230,13922}</p>
